channel.title: Old RS2
channel.description:
Im missing old rs2 I mean after the RSC went to RS2, I suppose there no server that actually is like that now?
I was logging into RS today, First of all I went lost when I TOUGHT I was going to varrock, second My HP wasn't draining and I was hiting 15-20s with New lvl 3 account... Doesn't feel like RuneScape anymore.. After that I just thought FUCK it can't play this its just wierd when I expected RS.. Anyway There is 500 RSPS out ATM so im asking if there any server that comes closest to RuneScape as it was after the Switch.

item.title: Old RS2
item.dc:creator: @_The_One `The One
item.description:
@_The_One wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:7, topic:352504”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=448857.msg3293455#msg3293455 date=1280784220]

No. They all suck major, major cock. I guarantee you that every 317 server you find out there will be based off of DeltaScape and have the same home, shitty shops, crappy combat, overused training areas, npc spawns, and feature-showing screenshots.

You cannot actually guarentee that, because right now it is a false statement. I have a server based from IClarity. Another from Hyperion. Please, do not make statements that even you should know cannot be proven true.
[/quote]I disagree. I said online. IClarly isn’t any better than DeltaScape anyway, and you having a Hyperion server on your computer doesn’t mean anything. Tip: It’s called stereotyping, by the way.[/quote]
Not trying to be mean, but nowhere in your post does it say online ;]

Read full topic

item.title: Old RS2
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Can’t be done, no server that advance has been released yet, the only server to have done this the closest I would say is WorldScape by Ry he is pretty much the only person here that has a 2000 connection server that has real content added and is the closest to emulating the RS2 protocol.

NOTE: To those who will say Hyperion can do it, please tell me how many Hyperion based severs do you see being developed that have a lot of content added and can still hold 2000 players, most of the people who work on Hyperion are stupid and make crappy updates to the server until it turns into a WL.

Read full topic

item.title: Old RS2
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

Any chance you can send me a link to the one you think fits in the description, every server I have visit I start with 100k and other crap, I Pking/skilling all that I like both of them but not gain 50 attack lvls by killing one NPC.

Read full topic

item.title: Old RS2
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

There are many out that are attempts to be like RS, but lack many important details. Your best bet is to figure out what you want most, Skills, or PVP. About the only way you will get something close to RS

Read full topic
